    Towards Realistic Face Photo-Sketch Synthesis via Composition-Aided GANs (CA-GAN)

    Published in March 5, 2020

    Jun Yu, Xingxin Xu, Fei Gao*, Shengjie Shi, et al. “Towards Realistic Face Photo-Sketch Synthesis via Composition-Aided GANs,” IEEE Transactions on Cybernatics, vol. 51, no. 9, pp. 4350 - 4362, 2021. (Corresponding Author)

    Recommended citation: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9025751

    Learning Efficient, Explainable and Discriminative Representations for Pulmonary Nodules Classification (NAS-Lung)

    Published in January 14, 2021

    Hanliang Jiang, Fuhao Shen, Fei Gao*, Weidong Han. Learning Efficient, Explainable and Discriminative Representations for Pulmonary Nodules Classification. Pattern Recognition, 113: 107825, 2021.

    Recommended citation: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0031320321000121

    Complementary, Heterogeneous and Adversarial Networks for Image-to-Image Translation (CHAN)

    Published in March 1, 2021

    Fei Gao, Xingxin Xu, Jun Yu, Meimei Shang, Xiang Li, and Dacheng Tao, “Complementary, Heterogeneous and Adversarial Networks for Image-to-Image Translation,” IEEE Transactions on Image Processing, vol. 30, pp. 3487 - 3498, 2021.

    Recommended citation: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9366371
